attributes.action: Stop Jon Venables' release from prison
attributes.additional_details:
Two year old James Bulger was murdered by two teenagers Robert Thompson and Jon Venables in 1993.

Both were released in 2001 after only serving 8 years under new identities but Venables was arrested once more in 2010 after being found with indecent images of children and sentenced to two years.

However, a parole board has decided that he is fit to be released back into the public. This should not be allowed to happen, he is a clear danger to the public - sign and help stop this.
